All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardFactory
Class that represents the abstract concept of a Board, providing nearly all the methods for the boards, since only the bitmask is different among the three different boards
Body
The Body class represents a message body used in communication player-to-server.
CancelGameException
Class CancelGameException is thrown when the game gets canceled
Client
The Client class represents the client application for connecting to the server.
ClientController
 
ClientControllerRMI
The ClientControllerRMI class represents the RMI implementation of the client controller.
ClientControllerTCP
The ClientControllerTCP class represents the TCP implementation of the client controller.
CommonDiagonal
CommmonDiagonalClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonEightSame
CommonEightSameClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonFourCorners
CommonFourCornersClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonFourGroupsOfFour
CommonFourGroupsOfFourClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonFourRows
CommonFourRowsClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonGoalController
Class responsible for the display of common goals in the client view.
CommonSixGroupsOfTwo
CommonSixGroupsOfTwoClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonStairway
CommonStairwayClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonTargetCard
Class that represents the abstract concept of a CommonTargetCard, providing methods for all the actual Common Cards
CommonTargetCardTest
Class to test the CommonTargetCard class
CommonThreeColumns
CommonThreeColumnsClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonTwoColumns
CommonTwoColumnsClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonTwoRows
CommonTwoRowsClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonTwoSquares
CommonTwoSquaresClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
CommonX
CommonXClass represents a specific CommonTargetCard in the game
Connection
 
ConnectionRMI
The ConnectionRMI class manages the connection of RMI clients to the server.
ConnectionTCP
The ConnectionTCP class manages the connection of TCP clients to the server.
EmptyShelfException
Class EmptyShelfException is thrown when the shelf on which is called calculateAdjacentItemsPoints() is still empty
EndGameScreenController
EndGameScreenController controls the end game screen in the client's GUI.
EndGameToken
Class EndGameToken uses the design pattern Singleton, since it can only to be assigned to one player during a game
FirstPlayerException
Class FirstPlayerException is thrown if the player is the first player
FourPlayersBoard
Represents a Board, it has a bitmask specific for when the maxPlayerNumber is four
FourPlayersBoardTest
Class to test the board with four pkayers
FullLobbyException
Class FullLobbyException is thrown if the lobby is full
GameController
The GameController class is responsible for handling the lobby, that includes all game dynamics, player's moves and connections.
GameScreenController
GameScreenController controls the game screen in the client's GUI.
GameStartException
Class GameStartException is thrown if the game starts
GameState
Handles the function in a different way based on the state the game is in.
GraphicUserInterface
 
InterfaceClient
The InterfaceClient interface manages the interactions with the client
InterfaceServer
 
InvalidBoardPositionException
Class InvalidBoardPositionException is thrown when pickItem() is called for a position that isn't valid according to the bitMask
InvalidMoveException
Class InvalidMoveException is thrown if an invalid move was made
InvalidNicknameException
Class InvalidNicknameException is thrown if an invalid nickname was provided
Item
The class Item represents the tile placed on the Board.
ItemColor
ItemColor enumerates the possible colors a tile can have
ItemsBag
Class Itemsbag is a singleton, since there is only one for game.
LoginScreenController
LoginScreenControlller controls the login screen in the client's GUI.
MenuController
MenuController controls the menu screen in the client's GUI.
NewView
The NewView class represents the updated view of the game state.
NotEnoughSpaceInColumnException
Class NotEnoughSpaceInColumnException is thrown when there isn't enough space in the column for the item(s) picked
NullItemPickedException
Class NullItemPickedException is thrown when pickItem() is called for a position that contains a null Item
OtherPlayersController
OtherPlayersController controls the other players screen in the client's GUI.
PersonalGoalController
OtherPlayersController controls the other players screen in the client's GUI.
PersonalTargetCard
Class PersonalTargetCard represents a card each player gets, stating where he should put Item of a given color in order to score additional points For each color we have the row and the column a item of the certain color should be inserted to successfully acquire points
Player
Class Player handles, at the end of a player's turn, the calculation of his new score
RejoinRequestException
Class RejoinRequestException is thrown if a rejoin request was made
RunningGameState
The states are almost entirely used to separate the setup phase of the game; when that phase is done, to signal the controller the game has started, the controller enters this state
Save
The `Save` class represents the saved state of the game.
ScoringToken
 
ScoringTokenTest
Test class for the scoring toke
SerializeDeserialize
The SerializeDeserialize class is responsible for serializing and deserializing TCP messages using Gson library.
SerializeDeserialize
The SerializeDeserialize class is responsible for serializing and deserializing TCP messages using the external library Gson.
SerializeDeserializeInterface
 
Server
The Server class represents the server component of the game application.
ServerInitState
a state the controller is in before that any player joins the game.
ServerTest
Unit test for simple App.
Shelf
Class Shelf occupies of calculating the points for adjacent items
SocketManager
The SocketManager class handles the socket connection, including reading and writing data from and to the socket.
TCPMessage
The TCPMessage class represents a message body used in TCP protocol.
TCPMessageController
The TCPMessageController class handles TCP messages received from the server and interacts with the client controller.
TCPMessageController
The TCPMessageController class handles incoming TCP messages and, based on the message header, does corresponding actions.
TCPMessageControllerInterface
 
TextUserInterface
Handles the TUI of the game
ThreePlayersBoard
Represents a Board, it has a bitmask specific for when the maxPlayerNumber is three
ThreePlayersBoardTest
 
TwoPlayersBoard
Represents a Board, it has a bitmask specific for when the maxPlayerNumber is two
TwoPlayersBoardTest
 
UserInterface
 
WaitForLobbyParametersException
Class WaitForLobbyParametersException is thrown if waiting for lobby parameters
WaitingForPlayerState
after ServerInitState, the controller enters this state if the first player's nickname wasn't in the saved game
WaitingForSavedGameState
after ServerInitState, the controller enters this state if the first player's nickname is found in the saved game
YourTokensController
YourTokenController controls the your tokens screen in the client's GUI.
